patthana21.39:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ.
patthana21.39:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ naahetukaṁ nasanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko sanidassanasappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana21.39:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.39:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ naanidassanasappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca … tīṇiyeva.
patthana21.39:3.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana21.39:4.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasahetukaṁ naanidassanaappaṭighaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ahetuko anidassanaappaṭigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana21.39:4.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
